1733538333773.taskDescription:
"Oh hey there, Goro! Got any fish? My coral buddies need a bit of cleaning and its a real bother to get back there myself, Goro!"
          
          Offer up sea critters to Korelii!"

1733538947377.taskDescription: **Korelii: Sage of Water** asks you to write about how your OC became infected with blight. 500 words or less.

1733542277474.taskDescription: **Darune, Dragon of Power** asks you to write a tale of your OC harnessing their inner strength. Can they withstand the heat? 500 words.

1733543413740.taskDescription: **Foras, Dragon of Courage** asks you to create a lively, full-color drawing of your OC standing tall with the wind in their hair, guided by Foras' courage. Full body, full color required.

1733545653439.taskDescription: **Darune, Dragon of Power** demands that you draw your OC surrounded by flames, invoking his fiery power to cleanse the blight. Minimum requirement: Full Body, Full Color.

1733546035541.taskDescription: **Darune, Dragon of Power** requires an offering of ONE of the following treasures to satisfy his appetite for power and help cleanse **Pommé**:
